TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextRange extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示两个 位置之间的所选内容。

span.span: Represents a selection of content between two positions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类引入了以下术语。The class introduces the following terminology. - **选择**-所选的两个由两个位置之间的内容**TextPointers**。**Selection** - A is a selection of content between two positions indicated by **TextPointers**. 以下方法之一将置于根据所选内容，固定的定位点，而另一个位置是可移动。One of these positions a fixed anchor with respect to the selection, while the other position is movable. 这是类似于由用户使用鼠标或键盘做出的选择的行为方式。This is similar to how a selection made by a user using the mouse or keyboard behaves. - **当前所选内容**-因为始终指示所选内容中的内容，因此最好只是指由所选内容作为*当前所选内容*。**Current Selection** - Because a always indicates a selection in content, it makes sense to simply refer to the selection indicated by a as the *current selection*. - **文本容器**-*文本容器*窗体流内容手头的最终边框的元素; 通过指示所选内容始终在范围内的文本容器。**Text Container** - A *text container* is the element that forms the ultimate border for the flow content at hand; the selection indicated by a always falls within a text container. 目前，文本容器必须是或。Currently, a text container must be either a or a . - **文档**-共同的文本容器内包含的内容被称为*文档*。**Document** - The content collectively contained within a text container is referred to as a *document*. 有关其他详细信息与相关的这样的字词*位置*，请参阅。For more information about other related terms like *position*, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性返回纯文本表示形式指定。The following example demonstrates using the property of a to return the plain text representation of a specified . [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_text)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_text)]

span.span: A fixed anchor position that marks one end of the selection used to form the new .

param.name: position2
param.span: 标记用于组成新 的所选内容的另一端的可移动位置。

span.span: A movable position that marks the other end of the selection used to form the new .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，将两个指定的 位置作为新范围的开始和结束位置。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, taking two specified positions as the beginning and end positions for the new range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A构成的两个由两个位置之间选择**TextPointers**。A is formed from a selection between two positions indicated by **TextPointers**. 这些位置之一 (由`position1`) 固定根据所选内容，而另一个位置 (由`position2`) 可移动。One of these positions (indicated by `position1`) is fixed with respect to the selection, while the other position (indicated by `position2`) is movable. 这是类似于由用户使用鼠标或键盘做出的选择的行为方式。This is similar to how a selection made by a user using the mouse or keyboard behaves. 新的实际端点可能调整以匹配适用于包含新的文档的任何内容选择试探。The actual ends of the new may be adjusted to match any selection heuristics that are applicable to the document that contains the new . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了利用构造函数。The following example demonstrates the use of the constructor. summary.span: 从指定流加载采用指定数据格式的当前所选内容。

span.span: Loads the current selection in a specified data format from a specified stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`为`stream`，内容从流的开始位置加载到流末尾。If is `true` for `stream`, content will be loaded from the beginning of the stream to the end of the stream. 否则，将从当前读取内容到流末尾。Otherwise, content will be read from the current to the end of the stream. 此方法返回时，`stream`仍将打开和中的当前位置`stream`是不确定的。When this method returns, `stream` is left open, and the current position within `stream` is undefined. 加载操作将当前所选内容替换为新加载的内容。A load operation replaces the current selection with the newly loaded content. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`preserveTextElements`是`false`、 自定义对象将保存为已知类型。When `preserveTextElements` is `false`, custom objects are saved as known types. 例如，假设你创建自定义调用`Heading1`，它继承自。For example, suppose you create a custom called `Heading1`, which inherits from . 当调用此方法与`preserveTextElements`设置为`false`，`Heading1`转换为时保存。When you call this method with `preserveTextElements` set to `false`, `Heading1` is converted to a when the is saved. 当调用此方法与`preserveTextElements`设置为`true`，`Heading1`无要转换的情况下保存。When you call this method with `preserveTextElements` set to `true`, `Heading1` is saved without being converted. 若要保留自定义文本元素`dataFormat`必须设置为。To preserve custom text elements, `dataFormat` must be set to . 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

.property instance string Text
Public Property Text As String
public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当前所选内容的纯文本内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the plain text contents of the current selection.

value.span: 一个字符串，其中包含当前所选内容的纯文本内容。

span.span: A string containing the plain text contents of the current selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性提取中当前选定内容，而不考虑可能会出现任何格式设置的纯文本内容。Use this property to extract the plain text content in the current selection, regardless of any formatting that may be present. 新行字符和段落中断被视为与此属性的等效项。New line characters and paragraph breaks are treated as equivalent with respect to this property. 当此属性为只读时，任何类型的内容包括在当前所选的分隔符将转换为新行。Any types of content breaks present in the current selection are converted to new lines when this property is read. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了利用属性。The following example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_text)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_text)]

exception.span: 当尝试将此属性设置为 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an attempt is made to set this property to .
